description: Mister Jip is a fictional character belonging to the Marvel Comics universe. He is an evil sorcerer, possessing a grotesque appearance and various mystical powers. He almost exclusively appeared as a villain to Cloak and Dagger, first in Strange Tales volume 3 and later in their own series with one appearance in an X-Men annual.
name: Mister Jip
powers: vast ability to manipulate black magic
ability to take over host bodies extending his life.
vast ability to manipulate black magic (energy projection
